mapper.select: select * from proj_contract where contractcode=#{contractcode} and contractname=#{contractname} and contracttype=#{contracttype} and status=#{status} and customer=#{customer} and startdt=#{startdt} and enddt=#{enddt} and url=#{url} and creator=#{creator} and createdt=#{createdt} and modifyby=#{modifyby} and modifydt=#{modifydt}
mapper.insert: insert proj_contract （ contractcode, contractname, contracttype, status, customer, startdt, enddt, url, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{contractcode}, #{contractname}, #{contracttype}, #{status}, #{customer}, #{startdt}, #{enddt}, #{url}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update proj_contract set contractcode=#{contractcode}, contractname=#{contractname}, contracttype=#{contracttype}, status=#{status}, customer=#{customer}, startdt=#{startdt}, enddt=#{enddt}, url=#{url}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
